Description: Blade currency. Wide, flat iron blade with pointing ends and handle.
Curator's comments: The slip refers to Petherick's 'Egypt' p.400 and his article in the Transactions of the Ethnological Society V 1867 p.232.
Acquisition name: Exchanged with: Augustus Henry Lane Fox Pitt-Rivers
Acquisition notes: Received in exchange from Lt Col. A Lane Fox (later Pitt-Rivers) on 2 March 1868. Lane Fox must have purchased it at the Petherick sale.
